name: Nutty Bounces
description:
Bounce your pine nut away! In this single/local co-op game, you play as twins linked by a rubber band that becomes bounceable when pink! Destroy as many obstacles as possible, but beware of the trees and the rocks that can brutally snap your adventure...

Challenge your friends to beat your high score!

For optimal gameplay, please play in full screen!

Controls:

WASD for initially left player and UP DOWN LEFT RIGHT arrows for initially right player
